https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ytpgtKcYR0wluKKktwTJEGWKwev.jpg Charly, a wealthy business woman, must decide whom she can trust when she falls for a sexy bodyguard who might be involved in a plot to assassinate her. Charly relies on seduction to get to the truth when her life is threatened more than once by a mysterious killer. Who could it be? What's their agenda? Will Charly find out before it's too late? Bodyguard Seduction
